name: Make-Up & Style
synopsis: This game has been designed by a female games designer! Allow your creativity to run wild as a famous make-up artist with realistic make-up tools! You can even create a 3D face, simply take picture of your face, place it onto a 3D face and apply make-up. Complete various missions and become a professional make-up artist. Features: - Create thousands of different faces - Use the stylus to apply make-up to the 3D face very precisely - 16 types of make-up tools: brushes, mascara, lipsticks, eye pencils and more - 23 missions with a humorous story in Career mode
